Text: What exactly will it do? Will it save my progams? What about their contents? I would like to try this but would appreciate a little more info. first. Thanks!!
Is this the trial version or the full version???
it is full version. it is freeware.

If Windows will not start, put the XP Recovery CD in the CD drive and start your computer. The XP Recovery CD has the Bart's PE version of Windows on it. This makes it easy to access your drives and fix problems.
